title: The Necro Device
description: John and Mary Hilt are hired to restore the Mandiev mansion isolated between four surrounding towns. In the past, the Mandiev brothers had a fatal accident which killed hundreds of local citizens. The event marks the beginning of a device that will control its creator and affect the community for years to come. Mary will discover the madness that spawned from its awakening and unravel its deadly secrets.The Necro Device is a mind-melting, suspense thriller loaded with hidden agendas, twists, and a diabolical plot. It all begins with a betrayal, a machine, and a darker intent... It has a purpose.Note: The Necro Device was originally titled Mandiev. After being picked up by a publisher a new name and cover art was assigned to it. It also gained a subtitle, Rise of the Mandiev. After being removed from the publisher, the cover art was restored back to its original classic look with a darker twist and is now known as the Classic Edition. All text versions of the novel are unchanged other than minor grammar and spelling edits.
author: M.T. Dismuke
